ygData.subject: Gun in Pic
ygData.msgSnippet: As posted by another user here, they pointed to the website... http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg and used the gun in the picture as a
ygData.messageBody:
As posted by another user here, they pointed to the website...

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/poorguy.jpg

and used the gun in the picture as a refrence, since looking at the pic and
site, you 1st notice the guy is lvl 100... umm YEA.. Gotta start looking at
that :) Open graphics program and notice that the text was changed, almost all
the text on this page was change.. other then the message text. <Graphics guy
here sorry folks> You'll notice that some of the items have been "PASTED" into
there respected positions, not a bad job thou.. but the smuging is blantly
obvious even for a jpg....but the gun isn't smudged.. <go look - zoom in>

HOWEVER... that would mean that this guy would have had to goto great lengths
to make a new graphic and model for the "gun", even thou the model info is not
avable to public <989 propritary> HUMM... makes me wonder... even the "BALL"
isn't pasted in......


Axehandler
